title: Disconnect at game start and unable to reconnect
body:
I jumped on for the 'definiteliy not dominion' game mode after a long weeks work to try and relax and was disconnected immediately as the game started. I attempted to reconnect the entire ~8 minutes the game lasted, got server errors the first two times i tried to login and blank screens for 2 or so minutes when I did get to click the reconnect button. The game ended and the post match came up before i could even reconnect, labeling me as a leaver and it seemed another player on my team had the same issue. 

I don't mind having connectivity issues occasionally, however in this instance I was given a leaver penalty of 20 minute waits before joining queue for 5 games. This has happened before because of the Telstra outages and ongoing problems. I hardly played for weeks because I didnt have the patience to stare at the timer in case I missed it while doing something else. Please can this situation be looked into and the low priority queue removed? I am not someone who leaves games on a regular basis and CERTAINLY not someone who starts a game I know I might be unable to finish.

Cheers
     {{champion:17}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately leaverbuster penalties are unable to be lowered and/or removed, the system is designed in such a way to prevent any potential taint.
